title: Cruz Bay Landing
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Caribbean, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers lots of salads and could add tofu. Has garden salad, summer harvest salad, southwest salad, veggie burger,and a curried chick pea and butternut squash roti. Vegans need to specify as egg, dairy, and/or honey is the dishes.
streetAddress: Park side, Frank Powell Park, Cruz Bay
